divs: sighting detailson 3\25\2013...i watch a show and record it. had jared lee on there. well when i was 9 or 10 year old i my mon and dad saw the same thang thes lights were right on the ground and moven fast...the next night thay lite up the hole holer tow more guys saw the same thang 3 mile to the north up close any way just saying . and if thay any way u can get me in touch with jared lee id like to talk to him thanks
